Title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
Writer: Vidhu Vinod Chopra (screenplay), Rajkumar Hirani (screenplay), Rajkumar Hirani, Lajan Joseph (screenplay), Abbas Tyrewala (dialogue)
Actors: Sanjay Dutt, Arshad Warsi, Gracy Singh, Sunil Dutt
Plot: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.
